skills.name: Banishing Punch
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Burning Beam
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target and delays their action.

skills.name: Oppressive Embrace
skills.desc: Imprisons a single target, preventing them from taking action or being targeted. The Imprisonment is dispelled if the Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit suffers Weakness Break.

skills.name: Shrewd Bombing
skills.desc: Deals massive Physical DMG to all targets, with a high chance to reduce their DEF.

skills.name: Controlled Blasting
skills.desc: The Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit explodes, dealing massive Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Overload Warning
skills.desc: Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit enters Overload Countdown, causing the next action to cast Controlled Blasting.
